# FruitSalade Test Data

This directory contains sample files used by the Docker test environment.

## Structure

- `hello.txt` - Simple greeting text
- `readme.md` - This file
- `docs/guide.txt` - A multi-paragraph guide
- `docs/notes.txt` - Short notes
- `images/sample.bin` - Small binary file
- `photos/` - JPEG images with EXIF metadata
- `media/` - Audio and video test files

## Conflict Testing

Several files have "(conflict YYYY-MM-DD)" variants to test the conflict
resolution UI in the web app at /app/#versions â†’ Conflicts tab.
